title: Update regarding Vitality Pharma
story_body:
Vitality Pharma (VIT) Update, 2023-02-15 08:00:00 EST

Vitality Pharma, a pharmaceutical company, has announced the following updates:

Personnel:
Vitality Pharma's Board of Directors has appointed Ms. Jane Doe as an Independent Director, effective 2023-02-01. Ms. Doe brings over 20 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry.

Marketing:
Vitality Pharma has launched a new website, www.vitalitypharma.com, to provide improved access to information on its products and services. The website features enhanced navigation and a revised product catalog.

Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG):
Vitality Pharma has published its 2022 Sustainability Report, which highlights the company's efforts to reduce its environmental footprint and promote diversity and inclusion in the workplace. The report is available on the company's website.

No further information is available at this time.
